faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about bruxism and BruxControl
faq.a1: Bruxism is the involuntary habit of grinding or clenching teeth, especially during sleep or stressful moments. It can cause jaw pain, headaches, tooth wear, and temporomandibular joint (TMJ) disorders.
faq.a2: BruxControl uses a 3-minute questionnaire to assess your symptoms and create a personalized plan. The app includes guided exercises, self-massage techniques, and Apple Watch sends random alerts to remind you to relax your jaw throughout the day.
faq.q3: Do I need an Apple Watch to use BruxControl?
faq.a3: No, Apple Watch is optional. The app works completely on iPhone with all exercises, tracking, and guides. Apple Watch adds smart alerts and quick status logging for jaw awareness.
faq.q4: How much does BruxControl Premium cost?
faq.a4: BruxControl Premium costs $29 as a one-time payment with lifetime access. There are no subscriptions or recurring payments. The free version includes complete assessment, basic exercises, and 2 self-massage guides.
faq.q5: Are BruxControl exercises based on scientific evidence?
faq.a5: Yes, all exercises and techniques in BruxControl are based on scientific evidence and recommended protocols for managing temporomandibular disorders (TMD) and bruxism.
